Package src.adapter.driver

Class DiskDriver

java.lang.Object
src.adapter.driver.DiskDriver
public class DiskDriver extends Object
DiskDriver is the disk driver responsible for manipulating the virtual disk
See Also:

  • RandomAccessFile
  • SNode

    DeleteSNode(SNodeDir dir, SNode snode)
    For the disk structure in memory: Removes target snode from Directory DEntry list. For the virtualDisk: Unsets snode reference in bitmap. Unsets all snode datablocks references in bitmap. DEfrags specified Directory DEntry datablock. Fails if target snode is a non-empty directory.

  • Constructor Details

    • DiskDriver

      public DiskDriver(File file, int numberOfSnodes, int numberOfDatablocks)
      Constructor of the driver
      Parameters:
      file - the file containing a source disk image
      numberOfSnodes - the number of SNode for the disk
      numberOfDatablocks - the number of datablocks for the disk

  • Method Details

    • newDisk

      private void newDisk() throws BitMapPositionAlreadySetException, BitMapNextFitNotFoundException, InvalidEntryException, IOException, InvalidLengthForSnodeException, InvalidSNodeException
      Configures a new disk given the driver instance attributes by creating a root directory and writing to the beginning of the disk It also configures the respective bitmaps.
      Throws:
      InvalidSNodeException
      BitMapPositionAlreadySetException
      BitMapNextFitNotFoundException
      InvalidEntryException
      IOException
      InvalidLengthForSnodeException

    • MountDisk

      public void MountDisk() throws IOException, BitMapPositionAlreadySetException, BitMapNextFitNotFoundException, InvalidEntryException, InvalidLengthForSnodeException, InvalidSNodeException
      Mounts virtualDisk from the diskImage
      Throws:
      IOException - in case something unexpected goes wrong
      InvalidSNodeException
      BitMapPositionAlreadySetException
      BitMapNextFitNotFoundException
      InvalidEntryException
      InvalidLengthForSnodeException

    • SaveDisk

      public void SaveDisk() throws IOException
      Persists virtualDisk to hardDisk
      Throws:
      IOException - when something unexpected goes wrong

    • WriteSNode

      public boolean WriteSNode(SNodeDir dir, SNode snode, String name) throws InvalidEntryException
      For the disk structure in memory:
      • Builds and adds DEntry reference to specified directory.
      • Updates snode reference in bitmap
      • Updates snode datablock(s) reference in bitmap
      • Update size of directory

      For the virtualDisk:

      • Sets snode reference in bitmap.
      • Sets all snode datablocks references in bitmap.
      • Adds dentry to directory datablock.
      • Update size of directory
      Parameters:
      dir - the directory to insert the new SNode
      snode - SNode to be inserted in specified Directory
      name - SNode entry name
      Returns:
      true if operation is successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      InvalidEntryException - when invalid entry is given

    • DeleteSNode

      public boolean DeleteSNode(SNodeDir dir, SNode snode) throws VirtualFileNotFoundException
      For the disk structure in memory:
      • Removes target snode from Directory DEntry list.
      For the virtualDisk:
      • Unsets snode reference in bitmap.
      • Unsets all snode datablocks references in bitmap.
      • DEfrags specified Directory DEntry datablock.
      Fails if target snode is a non-empty directory.
      Parameters:
      dir - Directory from which target snode will be deleted
      snode - Snode to be deleted from specified Directory
      Returns:
      Success of operation
      Throws:
      VirtualFileNotFoundException - when file does not exist

    • GetRoot

      public SNode GetRoot()
      Returns virtual disk root directory.
      Returns:
      Filesystem root directory or null if virtual disk hasn't been mounted

    • LoadBitmap

      private void LoadBitmap()
      Loads both snode and datablock bitmaps' from the virtualDisk

      InvalidEntryException

      InvalidLengthForSnodeException
